meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nutty.
meanings.sent1: Her cookies had a delightful nuttiness that made them stand out.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the nuttiness of peanut butter in my sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The nuttiness of his jokes always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The nuttiness of the situation was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The nuttiness of the squirrel's behavior was entertaining to watch.

meanings.definition: Behavior or characteristics resembling that of a nut.
meanings.sent1: The nuttiness of his actions left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: Her quirky nuttiness always brought laughter to the group.
meanings.sent3: The nuttiness of the situation made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent4: His nuttiness was like a breath of fresh air in the dull office.
meanings.sent5: The nuttiness of the professor's lectures kept the class engaged.

meanings.definition: The taste or flavor of nuts.
meanings.sent1: The salad had a delicious nuttiness from the almonds.
meanings.sent2: I love the nuttiness of hazelnuts in my chocolate desserts.
meanings.sent3: The nuttiness of the smoothie gave it a unique twist.
meanings.sent4: The nuttiness of the granola added a crunchy texture to the yogurt.
meanings.sent5: The nuttiness of the trail mix made it a perfect snack for hiking.
